data.meta_description: Learn about David Burtka on AppleÂ TV. Browse shows and movies that include David Burtka, such as Cicada, Dance-off and more.
data.text:
Something Borrowed

When Marshall and Lily's wedding is not as they had envisioned it, Barney tries to salvage the special day.

Best Prom Ever

Lily and Robin have to gatecrash a high school prom to check out the band because Marshall and Lily want to hire them for the wedding at short notice. Meanwhile, Robin finally forgives Ted.

Sorry, Bro

Lily and Marshall are dismayed when they hear that Ted is meeting up with his college girlfriend Karen who they find pretentious. Meanwhile, Barney plays a prank on Marshall which embarrasses him and Lily.

Natural History

When the gang attends a black-tie fundraiser at the Natural History Museum, Ted runs into Zoey, and sees a whole different side to her when she introduces him to her husband, the Captain. Later, Marshall and Lily argue over his career path and Barney makes a shocking discovery.

Twelve Horny Women

Marshall takes on his old friend and new nemesis, Brad, in the biggest case of his career. Meanwhile, the gang reminisce about their own run-ins with the law, leading to a debate over who was the biggest trouble maker as a teenager.
